description: Base part card schema - common fields for all components

field_descriptions.distributor_part_numbers: Dictionary with distributor names as keys (e.g., 'digikey', 'mouser') and part numbers as values
field_descriptions.lead_time_days: Integer indicating lead time in days
field_descriptions.tolerance: Number or dict with 'value' or 'typical' for component tolerance
field_descriptions.temperature_coefficient: String or number indicating temperature coefficient (for passives)
field_descriptions.thermal_resistance: Number or dict with 'theta_ja' or 'junction_to_ambient' in °C/W
field_descriptions.max_junction_temp: Number or dict indicating maximum junction temperature in °C
field_descriptions.efficiency: Number (0-1) indicating efficiency percentage (for power converters)
